Name: Bitterzoet

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: What a great little venue. This place has some great soul and a great feeling. I'm not sure there is a bad spot in the place to see a show.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: I went to the disco which is located downstairs. It was a cool disco with good selection of R&B songs! Dance floor is a bit small, bathrooms are okay (for a disco), lockers cost 2 euro, there is a smoking room and two old game consoles upstairs! If you like R&B then definitely give it a try!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: A definite dive bar atmosphere with toilets the like of which I've only experienced in some rough bars in New Orleans. Still all of this adds to the atmosphere and the stained glass windows are s nice touch. Door staff were friendly and helpful.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: It probably depends on who is performing but I went to the BBQ party with some friends and it was a great time. The crowd is definitely young to mid 20s. Drinks were priced relatively well. Dancing was great. Smoke room upstairs. The vibe …

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Very nice venue  that ain't too big. Tickets here are quite cheap and the smoking room is quite fancy and with nice lounge chairs.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text:
Very nice and cozy small stage...
Great place to see your favourite band.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Great place, gorgeous friendly staff, from the doorkeeper, the entry up to the bar no one could have been more friendly ! *****

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Best rnb and hiphop club in Amsterdam. I think the setup here is a lot better than Melkweg! If you love drake, kendrick, and old classics like biggie, then you must hit this club.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: One of the best clubs in Amsterdam. Since the venue is small the concerts are always very cosy and intimate.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Awesome music hall! Great acts in an intimate atmosphere and hip location. Clear sound system and crazy light show. Not too loud but enough to feel the beat. Good drink selection and fair prices. Lockers included for 2€. Highly recommendable!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Nice and small venue with a hearty atmosphere. Very close to centraal station so it's easy to get there.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Nice bar, great venue. Saw Paul Kelly here. Worth checking out. If only for the naughty stained glass!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: I love it here! I only come to bitterzoet for hip hop nights, but its great :) the staff is friendly and the music is good. Clean and big smoking area with really good couches. The only point of improvement might be the glasses; some of …

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: I liked the place very much! Nice balconies, the place is cosy and plays good music. Nice staff. I will be back!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Intimate, lovely and I enjoyed my time 5/5 Also Missio was great for this venue!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Great venue, I have been to see some great shows here.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: A brilliant place with a good atmosphere and people who like to get down more so than in most places around Amsterdam. Probably a better venue for hip-hop and urban music type of nights than for house music. …

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Cozy venue, very friendly staff and has large smoking room.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text:
A nice place where you can have different experience every night it's open.

Sometimes there is hardly a crowd on a popular night and a packed building on a …

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: went to see Naaz twice in Bitterzoet. it's a small venue with lot's of places to stand on different heights. I'm not very tall so it was great to be able to stand on the little platform in the bag so I could still see everything. I did feel like there were more people than the venue should be able to admit

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: The bouncer is the best part of this place. Nice guy. Small inside with a smell of sweat and red bull, the bright lights make it feel like they've forgotten its a club. Music was OK, but there are plenty of better clubs in the dam.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: I tried to get in here, the bouncer wouldn't let me in - maybe because I was solo. Anyway the vibe I got from people in line was students from Netherlands who got drunk for first time in their life - I'm not sure I would enjoy the club …

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text:
Amazing club. Visited with some friends and there was a hip hop and rnb night. Great atmosphere.
The only bad thing was the security man on the front door was quite rude.
Definitely going back again when in Amsterdam.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Cool music (urban, hip hop, everything with a nice rhythm). Quite nice crowd, not too touristy. But something was off. You don't feel quite comfortable either dancing, sitting in the couch or in the bar. Interesting windows etc, makes for a nice mystory.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Great club, had a real nice out here! Club is small but really nice and sound is great!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: One of the best rnb, hiphop, reggae, dancehall and overall urban music place in Amsterdam. Very good on Friday nights and Saturday night. Also good when the occasional artist performing. Tip: don’t arrive before 12am. The club gets jumping later in the night.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: The first time I visited Bitterzoet was because a cozy concert was held here. It was downstairs. The club area, I believe! Staff was nice. I had to exchange some (coin) money for the lockers. I wish somebody had told me that beforehand tho! All in all, the experience was lovely. So no regrets!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Amazing time seeing Lucy Rose. Fantastic venue, fairly small but made for a great atmosphere

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Small and cozy venue. Sometimes they have great bands/artists playing, which makes it perfect to see them really close. The drinks at the bar are at a reasonable price, and the staff is friendly and quick.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: It's a nice venue for concerts, close to Amsterdam Centraal aND they have a photobooth and really cool decor, but the toilets are not the cleanest so that's why I'm deducting a point. They look cool tho!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Staff was extremely rude. We weren't told there was a cover charge at the door, so we went inside to discover that there was a cover. It was pretty early in the night (about 11pm) so our group was hesitant to start the night there. The guy …

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: I went here to see Shannon and the Clams. The venue is quite nice and has a church like interior. But with a bar of course. Prices for drinks are reasonable. It can be quite warm inside though.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: I can assure you that this is one of the "good" clubs in amsterdam even though it's a bit smaller than others like AIR or Club Up. The vibe is always amazing. The staff works hard to keep the place tidy the entire night and the music is always on point.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Awesome place! Amazing music, friendly staff, average-priced drinks, great location. Would highly recommend to any visitor looking for a great time!! We had an absolute blast and will definitely be back!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Great little place for concerts! In this occasion The Slackers. #amsterdam #theslackers

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Great venue.  Will come again.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Always a very intimate concert experience and the interior is great!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Very busy on Thursday till Saturday, good place to party with friends. Different kinds of music for everyone (recommend to check lineup before on Facebook). Decently priced drinks.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Dojacat was on performance and she was good!! Nice place and close to da stage

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Intimite club experience, you'll get very close to the artist like he/she is playing at your house. Sound is also very nice, but the bar personnel is a bit slow for my liking. Overal still a good experience though.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Good music but thats it. The bouncer told us that he hates tourist‘s and we are just lucky to get in on this night(bc it was really empty so he just thought about the money we would bring) …

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: A small and really fun place to party. The staff is very friendly and the whole venue feels "cozy". It's also very close (walking distance) to Amsterdam central Station.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: We went on a weekend night and the vibe was good for the whole night. It was a €30 entrance fee for a guy and a girl which I thought a little steep, and the locker room space / bathroom is a little uninviting, but the music soon made that …

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: The party was good, but the place is really expensive. The security guy took 1 liter whisky from us and he told like we will get back when we leave the bar. Nope. He didn't give back!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Great club, with a nice diverse program. On my visit to Amsterdam last week I've been there a few times, and the club always surprised me. We stumbled upon the place in the center of amsterdam looking for a good party. We entered the club …

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Great club with super polite staff. It's very small though, not much chance to catch a glimpse to the stage. There were around 150 people and it was already cramped.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Probably one of my favourite small gig and club night venues in Amsterdam, saw Dan let Sac vs Scroobius Pip as well as John Cooper Clarke and both were ace. Nice upstairs balcony too for when it gets a bit too crowded.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Great club, went on the Friday night that one of the club's resident DJ had returned from maternity leave. The club had a great atmosphere. The DJ played an eclectic set, from bro step to indie. I was a bit disappointed not to see more mixing. Most of the time they appeared to be just sticking CDs on.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text:
*AVOID* *AVOID* *AVOID*

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Small but very authentic. Sound quality, especially the microphone, could have been better. Overall I had a great night here!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Very cool club with hiphop, drum and bass, rnb vibe. They got divine stained glasses decoration with naughty scenes that make you feel like in a church. They remade the smoking room recently, although this is still a stifling space where …

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Amazinggggg music! Definitely check this out if you want a good hip hop club experience in Amsterdam. lit until closing time. Drinks are a little expensive however

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Nice intimate place for live shows, 2 bars and the acoustics are pretty good, no garderobe but lockers which take 2 euro coins available.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Very small but cozy, you're able to get up pretty close to the stage. Great for smaller artists

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: If you're into hip-hop and R 'n B, this might be the best place to visit in Amsterdam. Laid back, very little macho behaviour and good personnel.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Nice place, the crowd is friendly and great music. On the downside, the club is a bit small but overall fun place to go out after hours!

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Good venue, small and comparable to the underworld in Camden. However limited view due to pillars and the genetic make up of Dutch people being unnaturally tall, and I am 6 foot 1.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Small capacity venue with great curation in collaboration with Paradiso. Love hat concerts are there, as the size gives the gigs a more intimate atmosphere.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: I went to Amsterdam with my wife for a city trip and we decided to see HAIM at Bitterzoet. We didn't have tickets for this sold out show, but managed to get some for face value outside. We were a bit worried by some of the bad reviews we've …

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Best experience I've ever had, went to Quinn's concert. Maybe it wasn't about the location, but it's the perfect location for indie artists like him.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: The owner of Bitterzoet is a hero of mine for how he treated me, my partner and our kids who were there to see the first concert of their lives: Ezra Furman (their favourite and one of mine). The owner let us in very early after seeing us …

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Cool club, there's two floors and you can see the bands everywhere you stand. The sound is good, the bar is ok.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: Unreal club if you like hip-hop or RnB type vibe. Saw Quessswho who was an absolute shut down. Bouncers were distinctly average though.

Name: Bitterzoet
Review Text: My wife and I paid 120 euro for the all-inclusive on New Years and were refused reentry after we left to get a bite to eat because they didn't have any food inside.
